name: SnakeTrap
description:
Unfortunately i was not able to complete the game. However what i tried to make was  a twist on the classic snakes game by adding walls and assets to confuse the player. Primarily what i wanted was traps and bots that attack the player. 

Please be kind lol. This is my first attempt and I underestimated the value of planning as i changed the game idea so many times it left me with 5 hours to code and as i am am not experienced i was rushing and came across a lot of snags where i was unable to add a lot of the mechanics and basic gameplay i wanted.

please give me comments on the game as i would love the feedback.

thanks
